variables.name: affectedArea
variables.description: Area of code affected by the bug

steps.name: Analyze Bug
steps.prompt: Analyze the bug: {{bugDescription}}. Affected area: {{affectedArea}}. Severity: {{severity}}. Identify root cause and propose solution.

steps.name: Implement Fix
steps.prompt: Implement the bug fix for: {{bugDescription}}. Location: {{affectedArea}}. Ensure the fix is minimal and doesn't introduce new issues.

steps.name: Create Tests
steps.prompt: Create tests that verify the bug is fixed and prevent regression. Bug: {{bugDescription}}

steps.name: Security Review
steps.prompt: Review the bug fix for security implications.
